parameters: There's really a lot of sleeping ones around,
粉砕エフェクトを指定
A Dryad infected with The Wilt loses all Mana.
──In the first place, can it even exist?
Such a disease, with such impossible symptoms?
An infection means the presence of pathogens.
Since pathogens are also living creatures...
Even for them, Mana is essential to life.
There are, but this time is different.
No traces of magic were found in any cases.
What about them, why can't they exist?
The one infected by The Wilt in Lavenderie
quickly shriveled and fell apart, as we know.
...It's impossible for a pathogen to rapidly deplete
its host of Mana that quickly without dying.
With exceptions of an extremely contagious one...
Which means... The Wilt isn't an infection.
So each Dryad's case should be completely separate...?
Or that should be the case, but as seen here,
many Flower Fairies in a group experience the same symptoms.
Then what's the meaning of it all?
give me time to consider things a little more.
I have a suspicion, but it doesn't
As long as it's not boring, anything is fine.
...I hope no one will die anymore.
The girl who died in town earlier was my friend.
What was Mollu doing back then, anyway?
What do you mean, I wonder?
After all, you weren't with us while
we're sneaking around town, were you?
You only joined back with us when the Dryad died.
No, no, no. Surely you jest.
I was with you the entire time!
Actually, I was concerned about another moment──
The moment we arrived at the Nursery, I mentioned
that this might be the source of the infection.
It doesn't matter if you did──
The question is, why did you react that way?
Well, even if so, isn't it normal?
To be surprised a first time visitor
would know so much, that is.
But we heard that from a Dryad in Lavenderie, though.
Yes, that's how we know of it.
But Mollu didn't know of that happening.
So that means what I think it means!
Mollu, you definitely weren't there with us!
That is indeed how it transpired.
While you were separated with us,
...Look, I'm investigating into The Wilt, right?
That's why I looked around for someone who looked
has now wilted in the center of the town.
And then we entered the scene and you joined up, hm.
What you said just now is weird.
Until the very moment she died,
Yes, as I have confirmed earlier...
That girl's Mana deteriorated far too quickly
to be from any natural causes. Which means...
Are you perhaps insinuating that I, myself,
am the cause of The Wilt?
Even back then, when we first encountered The Wilt,
Judging from the situation, you may have suspicions
about me, but that is but baseless conjecture.
So I have a proposal... For the next few days,
you will only stay beside me.
Should any other cases of The Wilt appear, your
I see, that is a great plan.
Looks like I can't talk my way out this time.
So, you... you're the one who did it?
Unfortunately, unlike the Flower Fairies, I am unable
I see... so you were consuming them as your meals.
I've tried many things, but no matter how hard
I try, I can only get Mana from Flower Fairies.
To start with, I tried it with you two.
That's why I hopped on for a ride.
Of course, it didn't work out for you.
So your next idea is to return to Lavenderie.
I needed to have you guys take me here.
After all, this place is my perfect hideout.
But if so, why did you come out of hiding?
Why did you go all the way to the woods, then?
...One day, a Dryad realized the truth of The Wilt,
and spent her life banishing me to the woods.
I was in peril. Moving in this small body is
difficult, and life might just not be the same
But I had no choice but to return.
The Nursery is the only place I can thrive.
For that cause, you've used us until now.
That's right. With you, I'll have no trouble moving,
and a conspicuous outsider allows me to slip by
Then why did you attack the Dryad back then?
Wouldn't it be way easier for you otherwise?
...Most embarrassingly, I was at my limit.
Though it'd ruin my plan, I had no choice.
I just wanted to grow. I just wanted to thrive.
Right, now that you said that...
It is the Sin of Life.
It is the sin of all life, the Original Sin──
All who lives is burdened by it.
...and everyone has also found their answers.
I'm sure you have too, Mollu.
For my sake, I averted my eyes from my actions.
That thought isn't exactly wrong, either.
Please, don't be any more evil.
Who's right and who's wrong here!?
Everyone is wrong, but is also not wrong.
It's not an answer that can be discovered through
principles, but only through the heart.
I'll put my all into striking you down.
So you won't forgive me for my growth.
That stone in the top floor.
It's no Dryad, but it looks like I can
Come up here and stop me, won't you?

events.name: エネミーシンボル：ランダム
events.note: <PsensorF:3><HMすり抜け禁止><HM8方向移動禁止>
